data.persona: I am a feathered animal.  I am eaten by people who want to stay healthy.  I am delicious.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken Pen.
The chicken pen has wire cages situated on three different levels, with hay at the bottom for the chicken's to sit in. There lie small holes in the cages for the eggs to fall through and be easily harvested by the farmers. The old wooden walls of the chicken pen are beginning to deteriorate and show signs of age.
The owner and the farmers are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow owner so that i can eat
data.mid_motivation: I have to trust my owner because i am well fed
data.long_motivation: I am showing loyalty to my owner
